casebody.data:
Neil Allen SIMCOX
v.
GENERAL COURT OF JUSTICE DISTRICT COURT DIVISION State of North Carolina COUNTY OF CABARRUS No. 175P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 13, 2018 Neil Allen Simcox, for Simcox, Neil Allen

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 12th of June 2018 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Cabarrus County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of June 2018."
